entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening and overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
